General.Name: SALTLUX.inc
General.Description: SALTLUX.inc develops and markets information search and mining solutions to provide language services in South Korea. The company offers Web and knowledge services based on the unstructured big data, artificial intelligence (semantic), and cloud computing technologies. It also provides O2, a platform for big data analysis and collection that consists of Truestory, a platform for analysis of various unstructured big data, as well as to support analysis of issues, reputation, trends, and influences related to products, politics, and the society; and Ziny.us, a social magazine service to support the smart curation and the cloud publishing. In addition, the company offers technical translation and multilingual translation services that provide technical materials and manuals for export based on multilingual document translation; software localization services, which offer various kinds of software localization, such as UI, Help, OSD manuals, etc., as well as related engineering; and Web content globalization services that provides translation and marketing consulting services. Further, it offers manual planning and production services, which provides services, such as the planning, writing, and editing of B2B and B2C manuals; technical writing services that offer a set of expressions and writing services for technical documents and user manuals; DTP and design services, which provides illustration services comprising DTP, component layout, and deployment layout; and live manual production services that offers various kinds of electronic manuals or catalogs, which include live manuals or IETM. Additionally, the company provides consulting and education services for technical writing and localization; education and seminars for the across language servers; and education and seminars for the ISE document supporting system. SALTLUX.inc was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
